document_data.mainbody:
Lavlaryn was a caravan guard in the midâ€“14 century DR.
Lavlaryn was one of the caravan guards for Orthil Voldovan in the trip from Scornubel to Waterdeep late in the . After an ambush, he was one of the guards searching the wagons for dangerous contraband in particular, he searched Mhegras and Sabrans wagon but found only peles, large shovels meant for bakery. He still kept a bowgun trained on the contrabandists until Orthil Voldovan took a look at these, to make sure they werent anything dangerous.
